alert-policy
************


Description
===========

An Alert Policy is a set of alerting rules evaluated against a target.
The alert policy is said to be satisfied when all rules in the policy
evaulate to true. If there are three rules: rule1,rule2 and rule3, the
policy is satisfied if rule1 AND rule2 AND rule3 is True.


Available Commands
==================

* change-compartment

* create

* delete

* get

* list

* list-alert-policy-rules

* update
